page.description: Get the expression needed to reconstruct a pointer.
page.original:
&ltTBL>.REFERENCE_EXPRESSION_GET() Syntax Expression as C = &ltTBL>.REFERENCE_EXPRESSION_GET() Description The &ltTBL>.REFERENCE_EXPRESSION_GET() method returns an Expression that generates a pointer to the table. Example dim tbl as P tbl = table.open("customer") ? tbl.reference_expression_get() = table.get("CUSTOMER")
See Also Table Functions and Methods
